defined_text = {
	name = TUR_elections_of_1912
	text = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_saviour_officer_coup }
		}
		localization_key = TUR_elections_of_clubs
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = TUR_saviour_officer_coup
		}
		localization_key = TUR_saviour_officer_coup
	}
}

			NOT = { has_war_with = BEL }
			BEL = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_frozen_foreign_assets_dm_foreign_power } }
		}
		localization_key = BEL_ottoman_debt_yes_opposite_remove
	}
}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			860 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_local_building_slots_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_local_building_slots_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_building_slots_factor_gelibolu_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_stability_factor_orestiada
	text = {
		trigger = {
			200 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_stability_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_stability_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_stability_factor_orestiada_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_orestiada
	text = {
		trigger = {
			200 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}

		}

	}

					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_eastern_macedonia_yes
	}
}

				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_selanik_yes
	}

				}

					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_olympe_yes
	}
}

				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_cyclades_yes
	}
}

		trigger = {

				controller = {

						tag = ROOT

		trigger = {
			974 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT

							is_subject_of = ROOT

						}
					}
				}

					}

					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_ikaria_yes
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			44 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_local_factories
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_local_factories = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_factories_central_albania_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_montenegro
	text = {
		trigger = {
			105 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_montenegro_yes
	}
}

		trigger = {
			809 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor_morava_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_local_factories_pirot
	text = {
		trigger = {
			821 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT

						}
					}

				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_local_factories = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_factories_pirot_yes
	}

	name = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor_varna
	text = {
		trigger = {
			211 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor_varna_yes
	}
	text = {
		trigger = {
			211 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_armenian_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_arab_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_greek_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_south_slavic_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_albanian_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_kurdish_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_georgian_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_romanian_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_assyrian_minority }
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = TUR_turkish_minority }
					has_variable =  TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_minority_no
	}
}

	name = ottoman_minority_tt_desc_antalya
	text = {

				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT

				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_antalya_yes
	}
}

			49 = {

					OR = {
						tag = ROOT

					}
				}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			353 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_disable_strategic_redeployment
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_disable_strategic_redeployment = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_disable_strategic_redeployment_erzurum_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_urfa
	text = {
		trigger = {
			829 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_urfa_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_artvin
	text = {
		trigger = {
			816 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			938 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_recruitable_population_factor_syunik_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_syunik
	text = {
		trigger = {
			938 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_syunik_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_resistance_growth_georgia

							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_ayn_al_arab_yes
	}
}

					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_mosul_yes
	}

	name = TUR_ottoman_compliance_growth_tikrit
	text = {
		trigger = {
			853 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT

						}
					}
				}

				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_compliance_growth = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_compliance_growth_tikrit_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor_oman
	text = {
		trigger = {
			882 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor_oman_yes
	}
}

					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_basra_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor_jahra
	text = {
		trigger = {
			885 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT

						}
					}
				}

			}
		}

	}

				}
			}
		}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_recruitable_population_factor_muscat
	text = {
		trigger = {
			294 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_recruitable_population_factor_muscat_yes
	}

							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_mount_lebanon_yes
	}

					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_semi_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_semi_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_semi_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_palestine_yes
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			455 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_local_intel_to_enemies
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_local_intel_to_enemies = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_intel_to_enemies_moab_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_hejaz
	text = {
		trigger = {
			679 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_production_speed_buildings_factor_hejaz_yes
	}

	name = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor_ar_rutba
	text = {
		trigger = {
			916 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_local_resources_factor_ar_rutba_yes
	}
}

		trigger = {
			917 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_stability_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_stability_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_stability_factor_sahra_al_hijarah_yes
	}

	name = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_rub_al_khali
	text = {
		trigger = {
			678 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_rub_al_khali_yes
	}
}

	name = TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor_suez_canal
	text = {
		trigger = {
			447 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_recruitable_population_factor_suez_canal_yes
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			457 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor_eastern_desert_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_recruitable_population_factor_aswan
	text = {
		trigger = {
			456 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				controller = {
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_recruitable_population_factor_aswan_yes
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_aswan
	text = {
		trigger = {
			456 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_stability_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_political_power_factor = 0 } }
					}
					AND = {
						has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_stability_war_support_factor_aswan_yes
	}
}

			810 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT

						}
					}
				}

				OR = {

					}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }
					}

					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_resources_factor = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_local_factories = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_compliance_growth = 0 } }
					has_variable = TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor
					NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_autonomy_recruitable_population_factor = 0 } }
				}
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_autonomous_vilayet_modifier_kufra_yes
	}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			817 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_army_speed_factor_for_controller
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_army_speed_factor_for_controller = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_army_speed_factor_for_controller_south_dscharabub_yes
	}
}

		trigger = {
			661 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							has_autonomy_state = autonomy_tgwr_ottoman_autonomous_vilayet
						}
					}
				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_attrition
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_attrition = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_attrition_trablusgarp_yes
	}
}

	text = {
		trigger = {
			450 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT

					AND = {

					}

						NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_war_support_factor = 0 } }

	name = TUR_ottoman_local_building_slots_factor_constantine

		trigger = {
			460 = {
				controller = {
					OR = {
						tag = ROOT
						AND = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT

				}
				TUR_state_has_minority_modifier = yes
				has_variable = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor
				NOT = { check_variable = { TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor = 0 } }
			}
		}
		localization_key = TUR_ottoman_state_consumer_goods_factor_algiers_yes
	}
}
